text: Forty-Ninth Parallel is a 1941 British Canadian World War II drama movie directed by Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger. It stars Leslie Howard, Laurence Olivier, Anton Walbrook, Raymond Massey, Glynis Johns, Eric Portman, Charles Rolfe, Charles Victor and won an Academy Award in 1943 and was nominated for 3 others. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 drama movies Category:1941 war movies Category:British drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Powell Category:Movies directed by Emeric Pressburger
title: Forty-Ninth Parallel
